topic.title: Hearing Loss Risk Factor - conformance rules

ol.li: Contains exactly one [1..1] description with data type String
Contains exactly one [1..1] riskFactor with data type Code
Contains zero or more [0..*] receivingProvider, where its type is Healthcare Provider
Contains exactly one [1..1] description with data type String
Contains exactly one [1..1] riskFactor with data type Code
Contains zero or more [0..*] receivingProvider, where its type is Healthcare Provider
